raw_markdown='[![Zendar Logo](https://images.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/ZwEc9rVsGrYSwaSV_nav-logo.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=1080&q=75)](http://www.zendar.io/</>)

[Contact Us](http://www.zendar.io/</contact>)
# Driving the Future of Road Safety with Next-Gen Radar Technology
By making high-performance radar more accessible, Zendar enables OEMs to equip more vehicles with the safety features of the future—bringing safer roads within reach for everyone.
![Dot pattern](https://images.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/ZxCyn4F3NbkBXpyQ_white_dots_top_right.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
## Maximize ADAS Performance. Minimize Cost.
Zendar's software-defined radar solutions deliver high resolution sensing and high-precision perception with reliable, low-cost hardware available from Tier-1 suppliers.
![Icon](https://zendar-marketing-site.cdn.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/ZwTrVYF3NbkBW_6q_Icon-4-.svg?fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
10x Higher Resolution
![Arrow icon](https://zendar-marketing-site.cdn.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/ZwTrVIF3NbkBW_6o_Icon-5-.svg?fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
Long Range Performance
![Icon](https://zendar-marketing-site.cdn.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/ZwTrU4F3NbkBW_6l_Icon-6-.svg?fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
Low Power Consumption
![Icon with arrow](https://zendar-marketing-site.cdn.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/ZwTrUoF3NbkBW_6k_Icon-7-.svg?fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
Semantically-Aware Perception
![Higher resolution graphic](https://images.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/ZxCwYYF3NbkBXpxh_10x_higher_res.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
![Long range graphic](https://images.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/ZxCwnYF3NbkBXpxn_long_range.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
![Low power graphic](https://images.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/ZxCxC4F3NbkBXpxw_low_power.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
![Semantically aware perception](https://images.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/ZxCxNYF3NbkBXpx0_semantically_aware_perception.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
## Software-Defined Radar for Safer Mobility
A
High-Res Front Radar
B
360º Object Detection
C
Efficient Radar Architecture
D
Software Defined
### Get 10x greater resolution with Distributed Aperture Radar
[Learn More](http://www.zendar.io/</distributed-aperture-radar>)
![Left Image](https://zendar-marketing-site.cdn.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/Zw0MBoF3NbkBXZLN_left-image.svg?fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
With coherent radar fusion, virtual antennas fill in space between physical sensor modules, enlarging the aperture to create a high-resolution "Distributed Aperture Radar."
![Car Image](https://zendar-marketing-site.cdn.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/Zw0MG4F3NbkBXZLO_car-image.svg?fit=max&w=1920&q=75)
### Semantic Spectrum radar perception software recognizes and tracks humans, cars, and other potential hazards with end-to-end AI models
[Learn More](http://www.zendar.io/</semantic-spectrum>)
![Object detection](https://images.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/Z4r7UJbqstJ99lz8_detection_graphic.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
### Simple, low-cost sensors stream data to a central or zonal compute for coherent fusion and perception processing
[Learn More](http://www.zendar.io/</distributed-aperture-radar>)
![Car](https://zendar-marketing-site.cdn.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/Zw0Q74F3NbkBXZO1_image-desktop-third.svg?fit=max&w=1920&q=75)
### Zendar software learns and improves over time, improving safety for cars throughout their lifetime
[Learn More](http://www.zendar.io/</distributed-aperture-radar>)
![image](https://images.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/Zxq1oYF3NbkBYAuA_download.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
![Background Image](https://images.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/Zw0LgIF3NbkBXZKr_background-gradient.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
## Design accessible safety features without compromising on performance.
Zendar delivers high-performance radar sensing for safer, more reliable ADAS features at a lower cost.
![image](https://images.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/Z4Wz7JbqstJ99Z56_university02.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=3840&q=75)
## Maximize ADAS performance & reliability with DAR
Learn how Distributed Aperture Radar (DAR) works to enhance radar resolution and accuracy.
[Learn More](http://www.zendar.io/</distributed-aperture-radar>)
[![Zendar Logo](https://images.prismic.io/zendar-marketing-site/ZwEc9bVsGrYSwaSU_footer-logo.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&fit=max&w=2048&q=75)](http://www.zendar.io/</>)

generated_description:
**Zendar: Pioneering Radar Technology for Autonomous Vehicles**

Founded in 2017 and based in Berkeley, CA, Zendar is on a mission to revolutionize the way self-driving cars perceive their surroundings through high-definition radar technology. As a proud member of Y Combinator's Summer 2017 batch, Zendar has quickly established itself as an innovative player in the automotive technology space, boasting a team of 45 dedicated employees.

**What They Do**

At the core of Zendar's offerings is their Distributed Aperture Radar (DAR), which enhances radar resolution to achieve a staggering tenfold increase in detail. This high-performance radar enables Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) to implement advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS) in more vehicles without breaking the bank. Their solutions focus on delivering reliable, low-cost hardware coupled with sophisticated software for superior sensing and perception.

Zendar’s technology stands out for its:

- **High Resolution:** Achieving 10x greater detail compared to conventional radar systems.
- **Long Range Performance:** Capable of detecting objects at extended distances.
- **Low Power Consumption:** Efficient energy usage that prolongs device life.
- **Semantic Awareness:** Their AI-driven radar can identify and track various objects, enhancing safety.

By leveraging software-defined radar technology, Zendar is making advanced safety features more accessible, thus promoting safer roads for all.

**Why It Matters**

In a world increasingly focused on safety and automation, Zendar's innovations are timely. Their radar solutions not only elevate the capabilities of self-driving cars but also make these technologies economically viable for a larger audience. This democratization of advanced safety features is crucial for the broad adoption of autonomous vehicles and, ultimately, safer roadways.

Zendar encapsulates what it means to drive the future of transportation—merging cutting-edge technology with a tangible mission to enhance road safety. For more information, visit their website [Zendar.io](http://www.zendar.io).
